DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate safety and efficacy of two different IOP lowering medications after six weeks of treatment in Caucasian and Japanese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 4 Study Comparing IOP Lowering in OAG or OH in Caucasian or Japanese Subjects C-02-32
DOC.criteria: Adults of Caucasian and Japanese Ethnicity
